EsdlBundle.Definitions: <esxdl name="IndustrialGlass"> <EsdlEnumType name='GlassType' base_type='string'> <EsdlEnumItem name='building_windows_float_processed' enum='Building float'/> <EsdlEnumItem name='building_windows_non_float_processed' enum='Building non-float'/> <EsdlEnumItem name='vehicle_windows_float_processed' enum='Vehicle float'/> <EsdlEnumItem name='vehicle_windows_non_float_processed' enum='Vehicle non-float'/> <EsdlEnumItem name='containers' enum='containers'/> <EsdlEnumItem name='tableware' enum='tableware'/> <EsdlEnumItem name='headlamps' enum='headlamps'/> </EsdlEnumType> <EsdlStruct name='GlassComposition'> <EsdlElement name='Sodium' type='string' ecl_type='UDECIMAL5_2'/> <EsdlElement name='Magnesium' type='string' ecl_type='UDECIMAL5_2'/> <EsdlElement name='Aluminum' type='string' ecl_type='UDECIMAL5_2'/> <EsdlElement name='Silicon' type='string' ecl_type='UDECIMAL5_2'/> <EsdlElement name='Potassium' type='string' ecl_type='UDECIMAL5_2'/> <EsdlElement name='Calcium' type='string' ecl_type='UDECIMAL5_2'/> <EsdlElement name='Barium' type='string' ecl_type='UDECIMAL5_2'/> <EsdlElement name='Iron' type='string' ecl_type='UDECIMAL5_2'/> </EsdlStruct> <EsdlStruct name='GlassSample'> <EsdlElement name='Id' type='unsigned'/> <EsdlElement name='RefractiveIndex' type='string' ecl_type='UDECIMAL7_5'/> <EsdlElement name='Composition' complex_type='GlassComposition'/> <EsdlEnum name='TypeOfGlass' enum_type='GlassType' default='building_windows_float_processed'/> </EsdlStruct> <EsdlResponse name='GlassInfoResponse'> <EsdlArray name='GlassSamples' type='GlassSample' item_tag='Sample' max_count='300'/> </EsdlResponse> <EsdlRequest name='GlassInfoRequest'> <EsdlElement name='IncludeComposition' type='bool' default='0'/> <EsdlEnum name='TypeOfGlass' enum_type='GlassType' default='building_windows_float_processed'/> </EsdlRequest> <EsdlRequest name='IndustrialGlassPingRequest'> </EsdlRequest> <EsdlResponse name='IndustrialGlassPingResponse'> </EsdlResponse> <EsdlService name='IndustrialGlass' version='0.01'> <EsdlMethod name='GlassInfo' request_type='GlassInfoRequest' response_type='GlassInfoResponse' /> <EsdlMethod name='Ping' request_type='IndustrialGlassPingRequest' response_type='IndustrialGlassPingResponse' auth_feature='none'/> </EsdlService> </esxdl>
